Race.SummaryText: Parishwide Home Rule Charter Amendment Proposition
Race.FullText: Shall "Article V, Section 5-04(C)(2). Human Resources Department" of the Home Rule Charter for the Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana pertaining to the process for hearing appeals of the decisions of the personnel review board be amended to read: "After any hearing, the review board shall submit their advisory recommendations to the parish president. The decisions made by the president in these matters shall be final unless overruled by a two-thirds majority vote of the governing authority members present at the vote of the employee's appeal."?
